mapper.sql: PLATE_ID, PLATE_NUMBER, PLATE_NAME, PLATE_PICTURE, PLATE_DESCRIPTION, POST_COUNT, EMP_CODE, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME, DELETED
mapper.select: select * from (select * from TOM_FORUM_PLATE ORDER BY sorts ASC ,update_time desc)

SELECT count(*) FROM TOM_FORUM_PLATE where 1=1
and name like '%'||#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' escape '/'

select M.* from (SELECT L.*, ROWNUM RN from (SELECT * FROM TOM_FORUM_PLATE where 1=1
and name like '%'||#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' escape '/'
order by sorts asc, update_time desc)L
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) M WHERE RN >#{startNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

PLATE_DESCRIPTION,

ADMINISTRATORS,
CREATER,
CREATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update TOM_FORUM_PLATE
PLATE_NUMBER = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATE_NAME = #{plateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATE_PICTURE = #{platePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATE_DESCRIPTION = #{plateDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_COUNT = #{postCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADMINISTRATORS = #{administrators,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PLATE_ID = #{plateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TOM_FORUM_PLATE set PLATE_NUMBER = #{plateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATE_NAME = #{plateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATE_PICTURE = #{platePicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATE_DESCRIPTION = #{plateDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_COUNT = #{postCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADMINISTRATORS = #{administrators,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PLATE_ID = #{plateId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
